lyrics: メリピン メリピン クリスマスメリピン メリピン クリスマスメリピン メリピン クリスマスMERRY ピン Xmas For Meどこにいるのかしら?ピンクの服着たサンタさん両思いになりたい!叶えてサンタさん街中みんなほらイチャイチャしてるこんなのずるいわ不公平U～nWHY? WHY?MERRY ピン XmasWHY? translated_lyrics: Meripin, Meripin, Merry Pine, Merry Pin, Merry Pin, Merry Pin, Xmas For Me Where are you?I want to be a pink-clothed Santa Claus.Come on, Santa Claus. You're all in the middle of the city. It's crazy. Unfair, unfairness. U. WHY? MERRY Pin XmasWHY? Why? MERRY Pin XmasMERRY Pin Xmas For Me Iyan Yayan Yayan Yayan Yayan Yayan Yayan Yayan Yayan Yayan Yayan!Merry Pin Xmas For Me, Pin Xmas For You Merry Merry Christmas, Merry Merry Christmas, Merry Pin, Merry Pin, Merry Pin, Merry Pin Xmas For Me? Christmas Merripin, Christmas Mering, Christmas, Christmas, Christmas, Christmas, and pink hat? I don't really think it's a pink hat. It's a lot of makeup. It's a long time for me to make a lot of makeup. U ~ n, n, N, and Meh. Yan MERRY Pin Xmas/MERRY Pin Xmas For Me WHY? MERRY Pin XmasWHY? Why?
